name: tarot-tg-app
description: Telegram Tarot Application - Frontend, Backend, Admin Panel

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin-backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin-backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../admin-backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:admin-backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:admin-backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && echo "No linting configured for backend"
scripts.lint:admin-backend: cd admin-backend && echo "No linting configured for admin-backend"

author: Tarot Telegram App Team
